did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, invitations, fliers, forms, photocopies of news articles, serials, and newsletters related to multiple LGBT organizations in the Rochester, NY area.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Gay activist and politician in Rochester, NY.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, invitations, fliers, forms, photocopies of news articles, serials, and newsletters related to multiple LGBT organizations in the Rochester, NY area.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Gay activists.
Gay men -- Societies and clubs -- Rochester.
Lesbians -- Societies and clubs -- Rochester.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: John Noble papers, #7850. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Related collection: Gay Alliance Of The Genesee Valley Records, #7560.

emph.ref: Series II. Gay Alliance of the Genesee Valley
Series III. New York State Lesbian and Gay Lobby
Series IV. Rochester Gay Task Force
Series V. Rochester Lesbian and Political Caucus
Series VII. Shoulders to Stand On (STSO)
Series IX. Empire State Pride Agenda
